I think she takes her friend’s advice and moves on based on the final page. The boyfriend takes her for granted. And the other guy showed her through actions, he’s willing to be a better guy for her. Washes her clothes and puke, listens to her troubles, pays attention to her sexually, has a job, takes care of himself and his place, and even calls her when she’s gone back home, to presumably check up on her and/or see if she’s interested in going out some time.

Everyone’s gonna feel what they feel from reading this, it’s a well written 26 page hentai. Here’s my personal take, you don’t have to agree. You know, the boyfriend’s been shown to not change at all, and be extremely uncaring. The very first page she says he doesn’t do anything at all, which means he’s been like this for a long time. Then when they have sex, he just thinks about himself feeling good and doesn’t care that it’s painful for her. And as soon as he’s done, he just rolls over and sleeps. I mean when she’s leaving, he doesn’t even care or remember and just shouts where’s his breakfast. When she gets mad, instead of thinking about what he did wrong, she comes back home to a dirty home and the guy doesn’t even apologize for his earlier behaviour. If a person’s gonna be such an uncaring dipshit to their girlfriend, then she doesn’t need to give a shit about them either, and yes that includes seeing someone else and breaking up.
She was in a weak state when the player went for her, she should've broke up with him in the first place though
